section.name: Roadmap
section.p: The roadmap for Wicket is not clearly defined. We usually look 1 or two releases ahead. In this document you can find the latest insights in our roadmap and what lies ahead for Wicket.

subsection.name: Wicket 1.1
subsection.p:
The Wicket 1.1 release is scheduled to become final for early september.
JavaScript support
CSS support
Markup inheritence
Experimental AJAX support
Improved URL handling
Include of external markup
Simplified Choice component
Improved Feedback support
Thread safe validation (bug fix)
Immediate button support for Forms
Panel support for TreeView
Date picker component
Component reference examples
Release information can be found here: Wicket 1.1 .
The second beta release is out for testing, with weekly or two weekly release candidates until early september (first week), then Wicket 1.1 will be marked final.

subsection.name: Wicket 1.2
subsection.p:
The Wicket 1.2 release is scheduled to become final for early november, possibly earlier.
AJAX support
Portlet support (JSR 168)
Clean and pretty URL's

subsection.name: Future plans
subsection.p: Some interesting ideas for the future of Wicket, but not currently on any planning horizon.

subsection.name: Wicket 2.0
subsection.p: No date available, depending on industry support.
